abstract: Well before the financial system nearly collapsed in September 2008, Barack Obama, more than any other presidential candidate, was warning about holes in the regulatory fabric and crises on the horizon. Soon he’ll be making his closing arguments to push the overhaul through.
snippet: Well before the financial system nearly collapsed in September 2008, Barack Obama, more than any other presidential candidate, was warning about holes in the regulatory fabric and crises on the horizon. Soon he’ll be making his closing arguments t...
lead_paragraph: Just over three years ago, early in his uphill campaign for president, Senator Barack Obama wrote to the Federal Reserve chairman and the Treasury secretary calling for a summit conference to address signs of trouble in the housing and financial markets, Jackie Calmes reports in The New York Times.

headline.main: Obama Looks to Close Sale on Financial Reform

abstract: Dismal results from the first-quarter earnings of AT&T and Verizon indicate a larger slowdown in the wireless industry.
snippet: Dismal results from the first-quarter earnings of AT&T and Verizon indicate a larger slowdown in the wireless industry.
lead_paragraph: From new restaurant openings to an improving job market, there are signs everywhere that the economy is flickering back to life.

headline.main: Prepaid Is the New Wireless Battleground
